thread.title: Heat and wind drive Front Range wildfires including one in Greeley

title: Heat and wind drive Front Range wildfires including one in Greeley
text:
Published By: Denver Post Local - Today 
Big wind and hot temperatures drove wildfires through dry grass along Colorado's Front Range Sunday, including at least one that has burned ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
